column2: "Nda no mu na Hezekia yaar owuyar. Na Amoz ne ba nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia baa ne nkyɛn bɛsee no dɛ
column4: Siesie wo fie yie; na ibowu

column9: mbrɛ mesi na manantsew w’enyim nokwar na akoma a odzi mu mu
column10: na mayɛ dza oye wɔ w’enyi do. Na Hezekia suu pii."

column3: ansaana Isaia rifir edzi akɔ kurow no ne finimfin afamu no
column8: na kɛse me man do ɔpanyin Hezekia dɛ
column14: mebɛsa wo yarba: da a otsia ebiasa no ebɔsoɛr akɔ EWURADZE ne fie."

column2: "Na medze mfe duenum mubogu wo nda do; na mebɛgye ɔwo na kurow yi efi Asiriahen no nsamu; na mobɔbɔ kurow yi ho ban wɔ mankasa me ntsi

column3: Hom mfa adɔmba tɔw mbra. Na wɔfae dze bɔtoo pɔmpɔ no do
Ebɛnadze bɛyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze dɛ EWURADZE bɛsa me yarba
column4: na dɛ mobɔkɔ EWURADZE ne fie da a otsia ebiasa no?"

column3: Iyi nyɛ asɛnkyerɛdze a ofi EWURADZE hɔ mma wo
column4: dɛ EWURADZE bɛyɛ adze a ɔaka no: ana sunsuma nkɔ enyim ntwerba du

column3: Ɔyɛ har ma sunsuma dɛ ɔpem adze ntwerba du: dabida
column4: mbom ma sunsuma nsan ekyir afamu ntwerba du."

column2: "Na nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia tseaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE: na ɔmaa sunsuma no baa ekyir afamu ntwerba du
column3: wɔ Ahaz n’ewiadɔn do ntwerba a oesian dada no do."

column6: na ɔsomae ma wɔdze nwoma na ayɛyɛdze kɛmaa Hezekia."

column3: na ɔkyerɛɛ hɔn ne ndzɛmba a ɔsom bo da no nyinara
column6: na nduhuam na ngo a ɔsom bo
column8: na dza wohun no wɔ n’akoradze nyinara mu: biribi nnyi ne fie
column9: na n’ahenman mu so a Hezekia ammfa annkyerɛ hɔn."

column2: "Nna nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia baa ɔhen Hezekia nkyɛn
column4: Mbarimba yi se dɛn? Na wofi hen baa wo nkyɛn? Na Hezekia see dɛ
column5: Wofi ekyirekyir ɔman bi mu bae

column3: Ebɛnadze na woehu wɔ wo fie? Na Hezekia buaa dɛ
column4: Dza ɔwɔ me fie nyinara woehu: biribi nnyi m’akoradze mu a mammfa annkyerɛ hɔn."

column3: nda reba a dza ɔwɔ wo fie nyinara
column4: na dza w’egyanom akora dze ebodu ndɛ da yi

column2: "Na woara wo mba a wofi wo mu no mpo
column3: wɔbɛfa hɔn mu binom so akɔ; na wɔakɛyɛ Babilɔnhen no n’ahemfie asaa."
EWURADZE n’asɛm a aka no oye. Osiandɛ ɔkaa no ne tsirmu dɛ
column4: Susuampaara dɛ asomdwee na nokwar bɛba me nda mu a?"

column2: "Afei Hezekia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column6: na ɔdze nsu baa kurow no mu no
column7: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Hezekia kɔr ne nsamankyir: na ne babanyin Manaasɛ dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
